item.title: Yojnaportal Whatsapp 100k 2025
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Yojna Portal - 100K Followers Celebration! Yojna Portal Your trusted source for government schemes and updates 100,000 Thank You For Your Support! Our Journey Together What started as a simple initiative to provide information about government schemes has now become a community of 100,000 strong members. Thank you for being part of this incredible journey! 500+ Government Schemes Covered 5000+ Questions Answered 300+ Success Stories Shared Key Milestones January 2022: Launched Yojna Portal WhatsApp Channel March 2022: Reached our first 1,000 followers August 2022: Expanded coverage to include all central government schemes December 2022: 25,000 followers milestone May 2023: Started state-specific scheme updates September 2023: 50,000 followers milestone January 2024: Launched query resolution system May 2024: 75,000 followers milestone May 2025: 100,000 followers - Thank you!
